name: Surgery Scheduling Software
description: Researching and designing comments & document upload features to elevate the functionalities of surgery scheduling software.

name: Thematic Investment
description: Designing an investment product for a wealth management mobile app, enabling users to invest in sectors of their interests.
myRole: As a lead designer, I worked directly with the CEO and a product manager to ideate user experience for the feature and gather product and business requirements. I explored UI options and got feedback from both product and development teams before finalizing the design and writing a product spec to hand off the project.
results: A working feature that provided an additional investment strategy for users and increased 60% of the total assets under management (AUM) within the first 3 months after its launch.

name: Custom Form Builder
description: Researching construction form creation process, conducting concept test, and designing a web app for users to create custom forms.

name: Hacker Application Portal
description: Designing a comic-themed application portal for thousands of students around the world to apply for Canada's largest hackathon.
myRole: I was a lead designer, working with an application lead, a graphic designer and a team of 4 developers on this project.
results: A working responsive application portal used by over 7000+ applicants around the world to apply for Canada's biggest hackathon.

name: User Account Management
description: Building tools for administrators to monitor and manage users accounts in construction projects.
myRole: As a lead designer, I worked with the product manager to gather requirements and participated in design critiques to get design feedback. I also ran a usability inspection to test each variation of my design. In the end, I wrote a design spec to hand off the project to a team of remote developers.
results: High-fidelity wireframes ready for developers to implement.
